name: Trick Or Treat (EpicStudios)
description:
Hey guys and welcome back to another EpicStudios game : "Catch The Pumpkins!" You can play this in browser or if you have a zip file runner you can work it with that as well. If it does not work try using the index.hml file to run it. The leaderboard is currently broken and is in development.

Please donate so I make better games.
